meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of the family Muscidae.
meanings.sent1: The muscids behavior is quite interesting to scientists.
meanings.sent2: The muscids wings have a unique pattern.
meanings.sent3: The muscids at the party were the life of the event.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as colorful as a muscids wing.
meanings.sent5: The muscids presence in the garden brought a sense of nature.
